title: Iodophor-catalyzed sulfenylation of indoles with sulfonyl hydrazides for the synthesis of 3-sulfenylindoles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29891-29895
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05383D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yashuai Liu, Yutong Yuan, Jing He, Sheng Han, Yan Liu
An iodophor-catalyzed 3-sulfenylation of indoles using sulfonyl hydrazides as sulfur source in aqueous phase has been achieved. Iodophor as catalyst and solvent is inexpensive, commercially available and no innocuous to the environment.
